Rules for Greed The Game:

The game is a dice game frequently played with two players or more, and consists of six dice being rolled and the players trying to achieve different combinations.

As a player, your goal is to reach the set score limit (usually 10,000 points) in as few rounds as possible. If the users roll value doesn\'t amount to more than a given "minimum value" (usually 300 points), then the current round ends and the turn goes over to the opponent.

The following scoring combos are available:
* Three of a kind (200-600 points (face x 100), except for 1\'s which give 1,000 in total)
* Singlets of 1\'s and 5\'s (100 and 50 points)
* A 1-6 Straight (1,000 points)

The game ends when the score limit has been reached by one of the players, thus rendering him/her victorious.
